availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Kentucky soldier. Kentucky native. Son of Benjamin Eve and Francis Eve. Attorney in Knox County, Kentucky in 1860. Served in he 49th Kentucky Infantry (U.S.A.) as Lieutenant Colonel from October 7, 1863 to October 21, 1863. Served in the 49th Kentucky Infantry (U.S.A.) as Colonel from December 14, 1863 to .

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Knox County, Barboursville, p. 28.
Compiled Service Records of Volunteer Union Soldiers who Served in Organizations From State of Kentucky, NARA RG 94, Microfilm Series M397, Roll 448.
Find A Grave, "John G. Eve (May 31, 1833-Aug 19, 1882)," Memorial #99320503, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial99320503 (accessed June 23, 2020).
